item.description:
For those of you not going to Montreal.....

This walk is organized by the Blue Hills Adult Walking Club and will be lead by a park ranger of member of their club.

Moderate walk, hilly terrain, 3.5 miles. Tucker
Hill Path to Headquarters Path to Buck Hill Path.
Return via Massachuseuck Trail and Doe Hollow
trail. Meet at Houghton's Pond main parking lot on
840 Hillside St. in Milton.
item.name: Blue Hills walk
